name: Spatium Curiositatis
description:
This is a project game made in 245 hours, the development is paused at the moment but I will finish it, i hope. For now is a demo with 3 playble levels.

It has a little storytelling, I'm really new in programming in Unity so I tried my best for not having any bugs.
